name.ingredients: 500g fish fillets (cleaned and cut into pieces), 1 onion (sliced), 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 2-3 green chilies (slit), 1 tsp black pepper powder, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 2 tbsp oil, Salt to taste, Fresh curry leaves for garnish, Lemon wedges for serving.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add sliced onions, and saut√© until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies, and cook for a minute.
Add fish pieces, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, black pepper powder, and salt.
Cook gently on medium heat for 5-7 minutes.
Turn the fish pieces carefully and cook until done.
Garnish with fresh curry leaves and serve with lemon wedges.
